name: NexxtSolutionsVektor
0:
”Alexa, Open Nexxt Vektor”
”turn on my guest WiFi”
”pause my kid's internet”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: nexxt vektor
Developer Terms of Use
des: Nexxt Solutions introduces the Vektor3600-AC and Vektor2400-AC, the next innovative generation of modular WiFi mesh connection. With Nexxt Solution's Wi-Fi Alexa Skill enabled, you can easily control your WiFi system in your home using voice commands to ask Alexa "Alexa, Open Nexxt Vektor" to get available features, besides, you may ask Alexa to "turn on/off my guest WiFi" or "pause my kid's internet". As the Vektor3600-AC and Vektor2400G-AC joins ventures with Amazon Alexa skill, life offers ease with a simple voice command from the comfort of your home, please take adavantage of these features.
